name: Atomic Industries
headline: The world's first AI powered tool and die maker
description: Atomic's mission is to replicate high-skill trade knowledge of tool and die makers into AI that powers new manufacturing systems which are orders of magnitude more productive.
generated_description:
**Atomic Industries: Revolutionizing Manufacturing with AI**

Founded in 2019 and based in Detroit, Michigan, Atomic Industries is ambitiously carving its niche as the world's first AI-powered tool and die maker. As part of Y Combinator's W21 batch, the company is on a mission to translate the high-skill trade knowledge of tool and die making into artificial intelligence. This transition aims to create manufacturing systems that could achieve productivity levels we've only dreamed of — we're talking orders of magnitude more efficient than traditional methods.

There's a team of 25 dedicated employees powering this vision, with Brad Flora serving as their group partner. At the core of Atomic Industries is the belief that technology can transform the physical world — creating a future where the production of goods can keep pace with the digital age. The company focuses on integrating AI with traditional manufacturing practices, effectively bridging the gap between the world of atoms and bits.

Their tagline captures this spirit succinctly: "The future of manufacturing is AI-powered." Atomic Industries envisions using robotics on assembly lines, significantly decreasing production times and enhancing efficiency. Imagine creating goods not just faster, but smarter — that's the essence of their innovative approach.

If you want to dive deeper into what they’re doing, check out their [blog](http://atomic.industries/</blog>), [press](http://atomic.industries/</press>), or see if there are any [careers](http://atomic.industries/</careers>) available. For direct inquiries, you can reach them at hello@atomic.industries or call +1 216-616-2866.

Website: [atomic.industries](http://atomic.industries)

Atomic Industries isn't just another tech startup; it's at the forefront of reshaping how products are designed and created. They’re not just talking about the future; they’re building it.
